    • getEventById

      public Event getEventById(String eventId)
      Retrieves an event by its ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The Event object corresponding to the given ID, or null if not found.

    • deleteEventById

      public boolean deleteEventById(String eventId)
      Deletes an event by its ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event to delete.
      Returns:
      true if the event was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • addEvent

      public boolean addEvent(Event event)
      Adds a new event to the mock data.
      Parameters:
      event - The event to add.
      Returns:
      true if the event was successfully added, false if an event with the same ID already exists.

    • getEventCount

      public int getEventCount()
      Gets the total number of events.
      Returns:
      The count of events in the mock data.

    • getQRCodeByEventId

      public String getQRCodeByEventId(String eventId)
      Retrieves a QR code by its associated event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which to retrieve the QR code.
      Returns:
      The QR code content as a String, or null if not found.

    • deleteQRCodeByEventId

      public boolean deleteQRCodeByEventId(String eventId)
      Deletes a QR code by its associated event ID.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which to delete the QR code.
      Returns:
      true if the QR code was successfully deleted, false otherwise.

    • addQRCode

      public boolean addQRCode(String eventId, String qrContent)
      Adds a new QR code to the mock data.
      Parameters:
      eventId - The ID of the event for which to add the QR code.
      qrContent - The content of the QR code.
      Returns:
      true if the QR code was successfully added, false if a QR code for the same event ID already exists.
